title: Charming Bordeaux Escape in France’s Celebrated Wine Region
description: Escape to the intoxicatingly charming and equally stunning wine region of France with a stay at Holiday Inn Express Bordeaux - Lormont, an IHG Hotel. Become completely captivated by the art, culture, fine wines and cuisine that blossom from every inch of this gothic city. In less than half and hour, you'll be sipping your favorite reds at the famous Château Smith Haut Lafitte, or spend your days strolling the banks of the Garonne River, soaking in the imitable culture of southern France.
location_description: Holiday Inn Express Bordeaux - Lormont, an IHG Hotel
